entry.title: Face My Fears
entry.summary:
Author: MysticRose1992

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,277Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 1,490

Summary: During what Red Hood thought was just a routine check of all of the warehouses in his territory, making sure no new gang was going to start a gang war, he stumbles upon a scene that would haunt his nightmares. A Death Cult about to sacrifice a child that could be no older than 4. After dealing with the cult members, Jason finds himself the new caretaker of a 4 year old toddler that also happens to be able to turn invisible when startled. What could possibly go wrong?

entry.title: Hiding In Plain Sight
entry.summary:
Author: aster_ion

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,722Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 46

Summary: Batman is wary of Superman. He doesn't trust the all powerful alien ‚Äì he's seen firsthand how absolute power can corrupt an individual. It‚Äôs only a matter of time before he snaps.Clark Kent is wary of Bruce Wayne. He's met too many men like him ‚Äì charming, arrogant, and swimming in more money than they know what to do with. He‚Äôs hiding something, Clark is sure of it.Bruce would do anything to learn more about the threat Superman poses, so when an unassuming new reporter with mysterious connections to the superhero takes over the Gotham beat, he doesn‚Äôt pass up the opportunity.Seducing Clark Kent wasn‚Äôt exactly the plan, but hey, Bruce isn‚Äôt complaining.

entry.title: dragon in the new warm mountain
entry.summary:
Author: outboard

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,242Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 46

Summary: The itch always starts on his back, between his shoulder blades, and it‚Äôs not so much an itch as it is this unignorable urge to abandon his vulnerable skin and give himself over to hardened black scales and large, powerful wings. or: Bruce Wayne is a dragon shifter, and while out flying one night, Superman falls from the sky. Dragon shifters are rare, and putting himself in close proximity to the most powerful man on earth is not a good idea, but Superman is unconscious in the dirt, and what is Bruce supposed to do‚Äîleave him there, vulnerable and unguarded?Against his best judgement‚Äîno. No he is not.

entry.summary:
Author: lostinreeverie

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,527Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 54

Summary: It took Bruce a long time to trust Superman. The man was an alien with god-like powers‚Äîif he ever decided to take over the planet, who could stop him? So, sue Bruce for not believing Superman was genuinely good, saving humanity for purely unselfish reasons. But it wasn‚Äôt years of working together that changed Bruce‚Äôs mind. It wasn‚Äôt even Superman revealing his secret identity as Clark Kent, though that had softened Bruce considerably. What finally broke through Bruce‚Äôs wariness was something small. A joint mission in Gotham. Or, Bruce finally lets go of his fear and decides to trust Clark completely.

entry.title: And I don't wanna go home yet
entry.summary:
Author: LuiGarMir

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,391Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 9

Summary: When Clark met Bruce, he didn‚Äôt think much of the man. Well, no. He‚Äôd had thoughts‚Äîa lot of them having to do with his chiseled jaw and strong shoulders‚Äîbut he hadn‚Äôt seen past Batman‚Äôs dark, gloomy, unknowable persona.The man‚Äîbarely a young adult when they met‚Äîhad been polite and deadly efficient, but also cold and distant.Clark, a journalist at heart, wanted to know more about him, but Superman understood how precious secrecy and privacy were. So‚Ä¶ He gave Batman some space.It took him years to discover the man‚Äôs civilian name. And it just so happened to be around the same time both men started getting closer. Or it was maybe the reason why they got close at all.

entry.title: claw your way out
entry.summary:
Author: Dragoneisha

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,256Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 32

Summary: Gift for waveoftheocean for the Winter Gift Exchange.**Superman opens his eyes and he is not in his body, nor his world. This is not uncommon, but it is rarely welcome, especially when there's magic involved. This time, though, he's a dragon, so... it could really be a lot worse.-Batman finds the new, imposter Superman to be too familiar and too strange to abide for long. Yes, that's clearly an imposter - he talks wrong. (He will not be considering why he has Superman's speech patterns committed to memory.) Juggling this and the sudden, unexplained disappearance of one Clark Kent, the responsibility foisted upon him by Superman's favorite reporter, leaves him with too many mysteries to handle alone.
